text:
@GovLarryHogan That did not help my mother or father, whom my father was sent home by a rehab center with CoVid-19 after refusing to test him for CoVid-19 even after there were 3 confirmed cases in the long-term care facility of the rehab/nursing home.

By the way: Both sides shared staff!
